title: Whales Bet on Ethereum To Plunge to $400 This Summer: Report - U.Today
summary: Whales are betting on Ethereum to drop to $400 this summer, according to crypto journalist Colin Wu. @Blofin_Official reported a large order of 26,000 ETH put options with a strike price of $400 and an expiration date of Jun 30. Some traders believe this is tail management behavior, while others speculate that the whales are expecting strong selling pressure after the ETH 2.0 deposit contract is unlocked. As of press time, Ethereum is trading at $1,263, up 1.53% in the last 24 hours.

title: Ethereum Name Service (ENS) Recorded Over 80% of All Time Registrations in 2022 - bitcoinke.io
summary: ENS (Ethereum Name Service) recorded over 80% of all time registrations in 2022, with over 2.8 million Web3 domain names created. 630,000 unique wallets created 2.82 million domain names, with 459,000 classified as 'primary names'. September saw the most registrations, while December saw the lowest. ENS is a blockchain-based naming system making the Ethereum-based web easier to access and comprehend.

title: Cryptocurrency Price Today: Green Dominates Chart As Bitcoin, Ethereum, Other Top Coins Register Gains - ABP Live
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Cryptocurrency prices are up today, with Bitcoin and Ethereum leading the gains. The global crypto market cap is at $824.47 billion, up 1.04% in the last 24 hours. Top gainers include Lido DAO, The Sandbox, Ethereum Classic, Decentraland, and Optimism. Top losers include Neutrino USD, BitDAO, Casper, UNUS SED LEO, and Chain.

title: Bonk Achieves New Milestone As Meme Coin: Eclipses Ethereum Transaction Count - TronWeekly
summary: Bonk, a new meme coin, has surpassed Ethereum in transaction count, processing 4.6 million transactions in the last 14 days. Despite a 57% daily decline, the token's price has increased by over 2,000% in the past week. Bonk's design includes a deflationary nature, with over 500 billion tokens burned so far, and the potential for additional burns through the use of new Solana mobile phones. Comparisons are being made to Shiba Inu (SHIB), with Bonk having a significantly smaller circulating supply of 99.185 trillion.
